data.title: Bally Rogan Films
data.text: BALLYROGAN FILMS is an artist run film production company based in Co. Wicklow Ireland. The company formed in 2015 by resident director Robert Manson to house his first feature film LOST IN THE LIVING, which premiered at the Achtung Berlin film festival, winning the Best Director Award, the film was developed through MEDIA funded ENGAGE. HOLY ISLAND our second feature film to be produced in recent years was funded by the Arts Council of Ireland's Authored Works scheme and had its world premiere at the 66th Cork Film Festival (2021) The film screened at festivals in India, Spain and the US and was released theatrically in Ireland in October 2022 and in Kino’s in Germany in May 2024 and VOD in June 2024. Recently completed experimental Documentary features; AFTERNOON IN JUNE, and featurette SUMMER AND WINTER had world premieres in Genoa (Italy) and Ji.hlava IDFF (Czech) a week apart in October 2023. The two new feature films in development are ‘Motte Stone’ and the ‘Ballyrogan House’.
